articles.title: NASA: Massive solar storm hits Earth, sparks VHF radio blackout in Asia, Australia - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA: A huge solar flare erupting on the surface of the Sun sent a solar storm towards the Earth on April 17. The solar storm was so strong that it caused radio blackouts.

articles.title: Solar storm sparks blackouts in Asia and Australia as earth hit by major solar flare - Express
articles.description: ON EASTER weekend, the Earth was rocked by a major solar flare that sparked radio blackouts around southeast Asia and Australia.
